title: BRIEF-Trueclaim Exploration Receives Conditional Approval For Listing On CSE Following Completion Of Reverse Take-Over Deal With New Wave Esports Corp
text:
BRIEF-Trueclaim Exploration Receives Conditional Approval For Listing On CSE Following Completion Of Reverse Take-Over Deal With New Wave Esports Corp

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Sep 19, 2019 19:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Trueclaim Exploration Receives Conditional Approval For Listing On CSE Following Completion Of Reverse Take-Over Deal With New Wave Esports Corp Sept 19 (Reuters) - Trueclaim Exploration Inc : * TRUECLAIM EXPLORATION INC. RECEIVES CONDITIONAL APPROVAL FOR LISTING ON CSE FOLLOWING COMPLETION OF ITS REVERSE TAKE-OVER TRANSACTION WITH NEW WAVE ESPORTS CORP. * TRUECLAIM EXPLORATION - TRADING ON CSE UNDER NEW NAME "NEW WAVE ESPORTS CORP" IS EXPECTED TO COMMENCE IN LATE-OCTOBER

BRIEF-Trueclaim Exploration Receives Conditional Approval For Listing On CSE Following Completion Of Reverse Take-Over Deal With New Wave Esports Corp
